flawed_nl_solution:
The necklace stand needs another 12 – 5 = <<12-5=5>>5 necklaces.
This will cost the store 5 * 4 = $<<5*4=20>>20.
The ring display needs another 30 – 18 = <<30-18=12>>12 rings.
This will cost the store 12 * 10 = $<<12*10=120>>120.
The bracelet display needs another 15 – 8 = <<15-8=7>>7 bracelets.
This will cost the store 7 * 5 = $<<7*5=35>>35.
In total, the store needs to pay 20 + 120 +35 = $<<20+120+35=175>>175.
#### 175

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 7, not 5. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
